item.PAYG: Pay as you go without getting restricted by a monthly plan
item.Recognize50: A monthly saving plan fits small businesses
item.Recognize100: A monthly saving plan fits small-to-medium businesses
item.Recognize200: A monthly saving plan fits large businesses
item.SMS Controller Service: A service to control the process of sending SMS and protect it from misuse

ANP.name: Adding New Person
ANP.brief: Adding a new person to you account
ANP.description: You can add an unlimited number of persons to your account

FER.name: Face Encoding Request
FER.brief: Adding a new image of an existing person in your account
FER.description: You can add up to 10 images for each person in your account; each image must have a single, clear face of that person

FRR.name: Face Recognition Request
FRR.brief: Sending an image with one or more faces to be recognized
FRR.description: When you send an image with many faces, we will detect these faces' positions, recognize them as per the provided information, and then send you back all the related data

OIG.name: Output Image Generation
OIG.brief: Showing the detected faces in the image labeled with their owners' names, if known
OIG.description: You can use this feature, along with the Face Recognition Request, to receive not only abstract data but also an image with outlines and printed data

subscription.unavailablePlan: This saving plan is not found or unavailable

subscription.invalidServiceSettings: At least one of the requested services has invalid settings
subscription.invalidServiceStatus: At least one of the requested services has invalid status

restriction.suspended: Your account is suspended now. Please contact customer service for further details
restriction.locked: Your account is temporarily locked due to several failed login trails, Please wait some time

otp.subject: Confirm Your Request
otp.introRegister: Welcome to {{productName}}, We are very excited to have you on board.
otp.introUpdate: We received your request to update your email.
otp.introPassword: We received your request to reset your password.
otp.intro2: Use this code: {{otp}} to confirm your request.
otp.outro: If you did not make this request, no further action is required on your part.
